page.title: 14Science and Techology.
page.content: The town of Pontefract has gained from the use of computer systems-from the use of Kimball tags to the use of Main Frame computers in the Town's banks and Library.The Library computer allows a much greater service for the public using a Barcode & Wand system.The computer also allows the librarians to find out very quickly the place of any book.The banks & building societies have also improved their service by using Mini-banks which stay open 24 hours a day.The Shop of the Future-"Argos" is also making great use of computers.Its point of sale terminals using a Barcode & Wand system allows the cashier to find out wheather the product is available or not.In many shops tha sale of home computers is the norm,with a lot of shops trying to get in on the boom industry.
